ygData.subject: RE: beast group (was Re: [Digest Number 83])
ygData.msgSnippet: Amen! I ve found I can group with most any class combo, it just changes how we play and what kind of monsters we attack. If the group is heavy in casters, we
ygData.messageBody:
Amen!

I've found I can group with most any class combo, it just changes how we
play and what kind of monsters we attack. If the group is heavy in casters,
we take on bigger things less often. If I'm grouped with four other meelee
classes, its an endless stream of blues. It pays to be flexibile.

But, it is the grouping I really enjoy. I love the interaction. I try to
make heavy use of the /friends list.

Stonedorn
Cunnan's Brewing Co.
Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: RaceFace [mailto:bean@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 10:43 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: beast group (was Re: [[EQ-Monks] Digest Number 83])


From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>


Personally, I think the best group is the one you have the most fun with.
I've found a group of about 10 people I regularly group with and we ALWAYS
have a good time. So much so that if I'm only getting the tiniest slivers
of experience, or even none at all, I just don't care. :)
